TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualTreeHelper extends System.Object
public ref class VisualTreeHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供公用程式方法，執行以視覺化樹狀呈現節點的一般工作。

span.span: Provides utility methods that perform common tasks involving nodes in a visual tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視覺化樹狀結構中的節點可以是或物件。Nodes in the visual tree can be either or objects. 專屬於一種視覺物件的方法的型別為其中一個或。Methods that are specific to a type of visual object are typed as either or . 不過，在某些方法類別可以接受代表任一種視覺物件的值。However, some methods in the class can accept a value that represents either type of visual object. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支援以程式設計方式存取之物件的數個不同的樹狀結構。 supports programmatic access to several different tree structures of objects. 主要，這會公開為視覺化樹狀結構和邏輯樹狀結構。Primarily, this is exposed as a visual tree and a logical tree. 在某些情況下，邏輯樹狀結構會更有用的表示法中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式，但在概念上是邏輯樹狀結構以外的層級實作類別。In some cases, the logical tree is a more useful representation of the elements in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application, but conceptually the logical tree is implemented at a level beyond the class. 不同於視覺化樹狀結構中，邏輯樹狀結構可以代表非視覺化資料物件，例如。Unlike the visual tree, the logical tree can represent nonvisual data objects, such as . 如需有關邏輯樹狀結構的詳細資訊，請參閱 [WPF 中的樹狀結構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information on the logical tree, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md). 邏輯樹狀結構也支援類似的公用程式方法類別， 。The logical tree also is supported by a similar utility method class, . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何列舉視覺物件的所有子系，如果您對將視覺物件階層的所有轉譯資訊序列化感興趣，這也會是您想要使用的技術。The following example shows how to enumerate all the descendants of a visual object, which is a technique you might want to use if you were interested in serializing all the rendering information of a visual object hierarchy. [!code-csharp[VisualsOverview#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualsOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[VisualsOverview#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualsOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以判斷父視覺子項目總數。Call the method to determine the total number of child elements of a parent visual. 值`reference`可以代表其中一個或物件，這也是為什麼通用的基底型別用為參數型別。The value of `reference` can represent either a or object, which is why the common base type is used here as a parameter type. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何列舉視覺物件的所有子系。The following example shows how to enumerate all the descendants of a visual object. 這是如果您想要序列化的視覺物件階層的所有轉譯資訊或執行分析或替代的呈現，您可能會使用一種技術。This is a technique you might use if you are interested in serializing all the rendering information of a visual object hierarchy or are performing analysis or alternative rendering. [!code-csharp[VisualsOverview#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualsOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[VisualsOverview#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualsOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邊緣模式值會決定如何呈現非文字基本的邊緣。The edge mode value determines how the edges of non-text primitives are rendered. |邊緣模式值Edge mode value|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||呈現為鋸齒邊緣的非文字基本的邊緣。Render edges of non-text primitives as aliased edges.| ||未指定邊緣模式。No edge mode is specified. 請勿變更套用至非文字基本的目前邊緣模式。Do not change the current edge mode that is applied to non-text primitives.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig float64 GetOpacity(class System.Windows.Media.Visual reference) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetOpacity (reference As Visual) As Double

param.name: reference
param.span: 要傳回其不透明度值的 。

span.span: The whose opacity value is returned.

summary.span: 傳回 的不透明度。

span.span: Returns the opacity of the .

returns.span: 型別 的值，表示 的不透明度值。

span.span: A value of type that represents the opacity value of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不透明度值會以介於 0 和 1 之間的值。The value of the opacity is expressed as a value between 0 and 1. 值為 0 表示元素完全透明，而值為 1 表示元素完全不透明。A value of 0 indicates that the element is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the element is completely opaque. 值為 0.5 表示的項目是 50%不透明。A value of 0.5 indicates that the element is 50 percent opaque. 值小於 0 會被視為 0，並將大於 1 的值視為 1。Values less than 0 are treated as 0, and values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

span.span: The X-coordinate guideline collection of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像素貼齊功能是，讓物件邊緣的裝置特定像素轉譯內容的配置固定的程序。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 圖形系統會使用裝置獨立單位來啟用解析度和裝置獨立性。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每個裝置獨立像素都會依系統的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定自動進行調整。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 這讓 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 應用程式針對不同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定進行適當調整，並自動讓應用程式感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 不過，這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]獨立性可以建立不規則的邊緣轉譯，由於消除鋸齒。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 這些成品，通常被視為模糊或 「 軟性 」 的邊緣，就會發生的一個邊緣位置落在裝置像素，而不是裝置像素之間。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解決這個問題，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供了 「 貼齊 」 裝置像素貼齊像素，透過視覺化樹狀結構中的物件邊緣消除柔和消除鋸齒所產生的邊界。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像素貼齊功能是，讓物件邊緣的裝置特定像素轉譯內容的配置固定的程序。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 圖形系統會使用裝置獨立單位來啟用解析度和裝置獨立性。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每個裝置獨立像素都會依系統的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定自動進行調整。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 這讓 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 應用程式針對不同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定進行適當調整，並自動讓應用程式感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 不過，這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]獨立性可以建立不規則的邊緣轉譯，由於消除鋸齒。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 這些成品，通常被視為模糊或 「 軟性 」 的邊緣，就會發生的一個邊緣位置落在裝置像素，而不是裝置像素之間。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解決這個問題，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供了 「 貼齊 」 裝置像素貼齊像素，透過視覺化樹狀結構中的物件邊緣消除柔和消除鋸齒所產生的邊界。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.

summary.span: 傳回點擊測試最上層的 物件。

span.span: Returns the topmost object of a hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載的方法採用和參數在點擊測試期間提供額外的功能：The overloaded methods that take and as parameters provide additional functionality during hit testing: - 可讓您控制在點擊測試期間的視覺化樹狀結構周遊的參與。Allow you to participate in controlling the visual tree traversal during hit testing. - 可讓您擷取所有的點或幾何，而不只是最上層的其中一個視覺效果。Allow you to retrieve all of the visuals under the point or geometry, not just the topmost one.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult HitTest (System.Windows.Media.Visual reference, System.Windows.Point point);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult HitTest(class System.Windows.Media.Visual reference, valuetype System.Windows.Point point) cil managed
public: static System::Windows::Media::HitTestResult ^ HitTest(System::Windows::Media::Visual ^ reference, System::Windows::Point point);

summary.span: 藉由指定 ，傳回點擊測試最上層的 物件。

span.span: Returns the topmost object of a hit test by specifying a .

returns.span: 的點擊測試結果，作為 類型傳回。

span.span: The hit test result of the , returned as a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回的值，代表已叫用的物件。The property of the return value represents the object that was hit. > [!NOTE] > 就可能會開始傳回 2D 視覺樹狀結構中的點擊測試，這是 3D 點擊的測試結果物件。It is possible for a hit test that starts in a 2D visual tree to return , which is a 3D hit test result object. 點擊測試啟動 2D 的視覺化樹狀結構中順暢地延伸至任何已定義的 3D 視覺化樹狀結構。Hit testing that starts in a 2D visual tree seamlessly extends into any defined 3D visual tree. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來叫用測試中的物件。The following example shows how to use the method to hit test the objects within a . [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void HitTest (System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D reference, System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback filterCallback, System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback resultCallback, System.Windows.Media.Media3D.HitTestParameters3D hitTestParameters);

.method public static hidebysig void HitTest(class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D reference, class System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback filterCallback, class System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback resultCallback, class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.HitTestParameters3D hitTestParameters) cil managed
Public Shared Sub HitTest (reference As Visual3D, filterCallback As HitTestFilterCallback, resultCallback As HitTestResultCallback, hitTestParameters As HitTestParameters3D)

public: static void HitTest(System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Visual3D ^ reference, System::Windows::Media::HitTestFilterCallback ^ filterCallback, System::Windows::Media::HitTestResultCallback ^ resultCallback, System::Windows::Media::Media3D::HitTestParameters3D ^ hitTestParameters);

param.name: reference
param.span: 要進行點擊測試的 。

span.span: The to hit test.

param.name: filterCallback
param.span: 代表點擊測試篩選回呼值的方法。

span.span: The method that represents the hit test filter callback value.

param.name: resultCallback
param.span: 代表點擊測試結果回呼值的方法。

span.span: The method that represents the hit test result callback value.

param.span: 要進行點擊測試的 3D 參數值。

summary.span: 利用呼叫端定義的 和 方法，在指定的 上起始點擊測試。

span.span: Initiates a hit test on the specified , with caller-defined and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `filterCallback`參數可以是`null`，在此情況下，它會被忽略。The `filterCallback` parameter can be `null`, in which case, it is ignored. 如果`filterCallback`不是`null`，它會叫用之前`resultCallback`。If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`. `resultCallback` 不可以是 `null`。`resultCallback` cannot be `null`. > [!NOTE] > 就可能會開始傳回 2D 視覺樹狀結構中的點擊測試，這是 3D 點擊的測試結果物件。It is possible for a hit test that starts in a 2D visual tree to return , which is a 3D hit test result object. 點擊測試啟動 2D 的視覺化樹狀結構中順暢地延伸至任何已定義的 3D 視覺化樹狀結構。Hit testing that starts in a 2D visual tree seamlessly extends into any defined 3D visual tree.
